com.ibm.disni.rdma.verbs

类 IbvQPCap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.rdma.verbs.IbvQPCap

  • public class IbvQPCap
extends Object
    These attributes define the maximal queue size of a QP.

        public int getMax_inline_data()

        返回:
        the max_inline_data
